spells.name: Aspect of the Wolf
spells.description: +4 Str and Dex, +2 bonus on trip attacks.

spells.name: Blessing of the Salamander
spells.description: Subject gets fast healing 2, fire resistance 10, and +2 to its CMD.

spells.name: Fire Snake
spells.description: Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.

spells.name: Snake Staff
spells.description: Transforms wood into snakes to fight for you.
